title: OData tool broken with 401 error - Analytics API authorization issue
description: The OData tool (wit-odata-query) is failing with 401 Unauthorized error. Error message: 'TF400813: The user is not authorized to access this resource.' This was working previously (commit d4d9e56). Need to investigate if it's an authentication scope issue, permissions issue, or API endpoint change. User may be missing 'View analytics' permission at project level.

title: Add list-team-members tool for discovering team composition
description: Implemented wit-list-team-members tool that discovers team members by analyzing work item assignments. Uses OData Analytics to find users with assigned work. Supports detailed and email-list output formats for WIQL queries. Includes handler, schema, tool config, and feature specification.

title: Fixed OData natural language query execution and velocityMetrics field compatibility
description:
Fixed two critical issues in wit-odata-query tool:

1. Natural language queries (description parameter) now execute automatically and return results - previously only generated the query string
2. velocityMetrics queryType no longer requires StoryPoints field - now uses CompletedDate, ClosedDate, WorkItemType, Title for maximum compatibility

Changes:
- Modified odata-query.handler.ts to execute AI-generated queries automatically
- Updated velocityMetrics to use generic completion fields instead of hardcoded StoryPoints
- Updated documentation in QUERY_TOOLS.md and ODATA_QUERY_OPTIMIZATION.md

Impact: Fixes broken natural language velocity queries and ensures velocityMetrics works across all Azure DevOps projects.

title: Remove list-team-members tool - not providing value
description: Removed wit-list-team-members tool that was not working well and not providing value. Deleted handler, schema, tool config, feature spec, and all references.

title: Remove list-team-members tool - not providing value
description: Removed wit-list-team-members tool that was not working well and not providing value. Deleted handler, schema, tool config, feature spec, and all references.

title: Rename all 25 MCP tools to verb-first convention
description: Systematic renaming of all tool names from wit-* prefix to verb-first naming (e.g., wit-wiql-query -> query-wiql). Requires updates to: tool configs, handlers, tool-service.ts, README.md, docs, resources, and prompts.

title: Remove standalone wit-validate-hierarchy tool
description: Removed wit-validate-hierarchy as a standalone tool. Hierarchy validation is now only available within wit-analyze-by-query-handle using analysisType=['hierarchy']. Created hierarchy-validator-fast.ts service for rule-based validation. Cleaned up imports, schemas, tool configs, constants, and documentation references.

title: query-wiql: Show generated query when using natural language
description: Implemented generated_query field in all response paths when description parameter is used for AI generation

title: Add functionality to discover current iteration path and include it in config for new work items
description: When not otherwise specified, new items should use the current iteration path. Keep in mind that this can change so it should not be hardcoded as one thing. This requires querying ADO to get the current iteration for the team/area.

title: Add functionality to discover current iteration path and include it in config for new work items
description: When not otherwise specified, new items should use the current iteration path. Keep in mind that this can change so it should not be hardcoded as one thing. This requires querying ADO to get the current iteration for the team/area.

title: Define AI analysis tool for intelligent query handle analysis
description: Create a new AI analysis tool that accepts a query handle and natural language intent, retrieves full context packages, performs intelligent AI analysis, and returns concise results. This consolidates analyze-workitem, analyze-assignment, analyze-workload, recommend-parent, and plan-sprint into a unified analyze-bulk tool with analysis type parameters.

title: Document Analytics API permission requirements
description: Create clear documentation explaining that OData Analytics queries require 'View analytics' permission at the project level in Azure DevOps. Document the difference between Analytics API permissions and regular work item read permissions. Add troubleshooting guide for 401 errors. Suggest WIQL as fallback option.

title: Refactor analysis tools into analyze-bulk parameters
description: Convert analyze-workitem, analyze-assignment, and recommend-parent into operation types within the analyze-bulk tool. This reduces tool confusion and consolidates analysis operations.

title: Fix iteration path discovery for non-standard area path structures
description: Current iteration path discovery assumes standard area path format (Project\Team\SubArea) where segments[1] is the team name. However, actual area path structures may differ. User reports: Area path leads to discovering 'One\Custom\Azure\CY2022H1 - Nickel\12 - December' but actual team is 'Krypton' with iteration 'One\Krypton'. Need to make team name extraction more flexible or configurable.

title: Address beta tester feedback - 3 improvement requests
description: Implement 3 improvements from beta tester feedback: 1) Add human-readable time fields to query handle responses, 2) Include score legends in AI analysis output, 3) Clarify when wit-extract-security-links should be used

title: Fix personal workload analyzer to use CONTAINS for email matching
description: The personal-workload analyzer uses exact equality for System.AssignedTo field, but ADO stores 'Display Name <email@domain.com>' format. Need to use CONTAINS operator instead.

title: Fixed: ai-query-analyzer prompt not found error
description: Moved ai-query-analyzer.md from prompts/ to prompts/system/ to match loadSystemPrompt expectations. The SamplingClient was failing to load the system prompt because it was looking in the system subdirectory.

title: Enhanced: Better error messages for sprint planner 404s
description: Added validation and enhanced error messages in sprint-planner.ts to help users debug 404 errors. Now includes organization and project names in error messages and validates these are present before making API calls.

title: Fixed: Sprint planner 404 error with project-scoped WIQL
description: Changed sprint planner to use organization-level WIQL queries instead of project-scoped queries. This matches the WIQL tool behavior and avoids 404 errors when project-scoped endpoints have permission issues. Project scope is still enforced via area path filtering in WHERE clauses.

title: Add batch personal workload analysis tool
description: Create analyze-workload-batch tool that processes multiple team members in parallel and returns all results at once. This improves performance for team health analysis.

title: Fix sprint-planner 404 error - WIQL queries need project-scoped HTTP client
Story point analysis incorrectly reports 0 effort for items with Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.Effort field
description:
Analysis tools were hardcoded to only check Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StoryPoints field, but some ADO projects (like msazure/One) use Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.Effort instead. This caused effort analysis to incorrectly report 0 story points for items that had valid effort values.

Fixed by:
1. Created getEffortValue() helper function that checks both field names
2. Updated analyze-by-query-handle.handler.ts effort analysis functions
3. Updated get-work-item-context-package.handler.ts to fetch and return both fields
4. Updated clone-work-item.handler.ts to copy effort correctly
5. Updated personal-workload.ts analyzer to use both fields
6. Updated ado-work-item-service.ts AUTOMATED_FIELDS list

Root cause: Azure DevOps uses different field names for effort/story points depending on the process template (Scrum vs. Agile)

title: Add tool to discover available subagents in repositories
description: Create a new MCP tool that scans /.azuredevops/policies directory in Azure DevOps repos to find specialized Copilot agents. Tool should parse YAML metadata (name and description) and return a list of available subagents.

title: Remove broken plan-sprint tool
description: Remove plan-sprint tool that is broken and not useful. Includes: tool config, schema, handler, analyzer, tests, docs, and prompts.

title: Fix stalenessThresholdDays template variable in backlog_cleanup prompt
description: The {{stalenessThresholdDays}} template variable was not being substituted in the backlog_cleanup.md prompt because it wasn't included in the createTemplateVariables function. Added support for this variable with a default of 180 days. Tested with build and unit tests - all passing (605 tests). Should add integration test for prompt variable substitution.

title: Fix OData date format compatibility in team health analyzer prompt
description: The team_health_analyzer.md prompt template uses incorrect date format for OData queries. Template uses {{start_date_iso}}Z but OData requires full ISO 8601 timestamps. This causes queries to return 0 results.

title: Replace 'any' types with proper TypeScript types
description: Codebase has 50+ uses of 'any' and 'unknown' types that reduce type safety. Key areas: ai-assignment.ts, schemas.ts, work-item-parser.ts. Should use proper interfaces and Zod schemas.
notes: Replaced 'any' types in multiple files: work-item-parser.ts (ADOWorkItem, ADORelation), paths.ts (ModuleDirExport with ts-expect-error), forensic-undo handler (unknown for field values), wiql-query handler (WiqlQueryArgs type). Build and tests passing. More 'any' types remain in analyzers and handlers that need careful review of AI response parsing.

title: Remove deprecated areaPath and defaultAreaPath properties
description: Config interface has @deprecated properties (areaPath, defaultAreaPath) that should be removed in favor of areaPaths array. Migration path needed.
notes: Analysis complete: Removing areaPath/defaultAreaPath requires migration path. Used in 10+ files including handlers (get-team-members, odata-query, wiql-query, create-new-item). Need: 1) Add migration guide, 2) Update all handler usages to use array form, 3) Add deprecation warnings, 4) Version bump with changelog. Estimated 3-4 hours work. Deferring to avoid breaking changes without user communication.

title: Fix markdown linting errors in documentation
description: README.md has 40+ markdownlint violations: list indentation, blank lines around fences, headings spacing. Affects README.md and backlog_cleanup.md prompt.
notes: No markdownlint configuration or errors detected in VS Code. No markdownlint CLI tool installed. Cannot reproduce 40+ violations mentioned. If linting is needed, recommend: 1) Install markdownlint-cli, 2) Add .markdownlint.json config, 3) Run markdownlint to identify specific issues.

title: Standardize logging - remove direct console calls
description: Code has direct console.error/log calls instead of using logger utility. Found in paths.ts and markdown-converter.ts. All logging should go through logger service.

title: Improve test coverage for critical paths
description: Need comprehensive test coverage analysis. 94 test files exist but coverage report failed. Focus on error handling paths, bulk operations edge cases, query handle expiration. Target >85% coverage.
notes: Added comprehensive test coverage for get-configuration.handler.ts (14 tests, all passing). Created date-iso-formatting.test.ts (6 tests). Fixed TypeScript compilation error in paths.ts by adding module-dir.d.mts type declarations. Current overall coverage: 23.83%. Need systematic approach to improve critical handlers.

title: Performance optimization - reduce API calls in bulk operations
description: Bulk operations make sequential API calls. Opportunities: batch update requests, parallel processing where safe, reduce redundant field fetches. Current ~50 updates/sec, target 100+.

description: Bulk operations make sequential API calls. Opportunities: batch update requests, parallel processing where safe, reduce redundant field fetches. Current ~50 updates/sec, target 100+.

title: OData handler fixed - added parameter validation
description: Fixed OData Analytics handler to validate organization and project parameters before constructing API URLs. Previously, if these parameters were undefined, the URL would contain 'undefined' values causing 401 authorization errors. Added defensive validation with clear error messages guiding users to check their MCP server CLI configuration.

title: Add configurable AI operation timeouts
description: AI operations have hardcoded timeouts: 30s (ai-assignment), 120s (personal-workload, ai-query-analyzer). Should be configurable for slow models or complex analyses.

title: Make rate limiter configurable per organization
description: Rate limiter uses hardcoded values (200 capacity, 3.33 refill). Should be configurable per ADO organization to handle different API quota limits.

title: Ensure all error paths use structured error categorization
description: Error categorization framework exists (ErrorCategory, ErrorCode) but not consistently used across all handlers. Audit all error paths and ensure they use structured builders.
notes: Error categorization framework exists (ErrorCategory, ErrorCode, buildErrorResponse). Found 30+ manual error returns without categorization. Need to: 1) Audit all handlers for error returns, 2) Replace manual returns with buildErrorResponse/formatError calls, 3) Add appropriate ErrorCategory/ErrorCode to each. Large refactoring task - recommend breaking into subtasks by handler category (query, bulk, context, etc).

title: Remove @ts-ignore directive from paths.ts
description: paths.ts has @ts-ignore directive for .mjs import. Should either add proper type declarations, use require with typing, or refactor to avoid the import. TypeScript should catch all errors.

title: Migrate tasklist.md content to beads issues
description: tasklist/tasklist.md contains active bugs that should be tracked in beads. Content includes: OData date format bug, story points field mapping, sprint planning 404 error. Migrate and delete file.

title: Review and adjust performance benchmark thresholds
description: Performance thresholds in benchmark-config.ts may not reflect production reality. Need to run benchmarks in CI, collect baseline metrics, adjust thresholds based on actual performance.

title: Document query handle cleanup strategy
description: Query handles expire after 1 hour but no documented cleanup strategy for long-running bulk operations. Need guidance on handle renewal and progress checkpointing.

title: Fix story points field mapping in AI analysis tools
description: AI analysis tools report 0 story points for work items that have Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.Effort populated. The field parser needs to map Effort field to story points for correct analysis. Example: Work item 35655356 has Effort=5 but tools report 0 story points.

title: Fix sprint planning 404 error for project lookup
description: Sprint planning analysis fails with HTTP 404 when fetching active work items. Error shows project 'One' not found, but area path suggests project extraction may be failing. Need to verify project name extraction logic and query construction.
notes: Investigated project extraction logic - appears correct (first segment of area path). Error shows area path 'One\\Azure Compute\\...' which should extract project 'One'. Two possibilities: 1) Project name mismatch (actual project has different name), 2) Permission issue. Need actual reproduction case to debug further. Project extraction code at config.ts:30 follows ADO conventions correctly.

title: Investigate query result count discrepancy
description: WIQL query for active work items under area path returned only 8 items when more were expected. Need to investigate if this is: 1) Correct behavior with restrictive state filtering, 2) Query execution issue, or 3) Permission/scope limitation. Query: SELECT [System.Id] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'One\\Azure Compute\\OneFleet Node\\Azure Host Agent\\Azure Host Gateway' AND [System.State] NOT IN ('Done', 'Removed', 'Closed', 'Completed', 'Resolved')

title: OData 401 root cause: OAuth vs Azure CLI authentication mismatch
description: The MCP server was using 'interactive' OAuth authentication by default, but the Analytics API requires Azure CLI tokens. When users tested manually with 'az account get-access-token', it worked, but the MCP server's OAuth tokens were rejected with 401. Solution: Added --authentication azcli flag to mcp.json configuration to force Azure CLI token usage.

title: Remove eval() usage in resource-service.ts for ESM environment detection
description: Security concern: resource-service.ts uses eval('import.meta.url') at line 27 to detect ESM environment. This is a security vulnerability and code smell. Should use safer alternatives like checking for __filename or using import.meta directly with proper TypeScript configuration.

title: Replace 'any' types with proper type definitions across codebase
description: Found 40+ instances of 'any' type usage across handlers, analyzers, and service files. This defeats TypeScript's type safety. Key locations: unified-bulk-operations.handler.ts, hierarchy-analysis-with-handles.handler.ts, ai-query-analyzer.ts, hierarchy-validator.ts. Should define proper interfaces and types.

title: Fix OData date format in team_health_analyzer prompt template
description: OData queries in team_health_analyzer.md use incorrect date format. Currently uses {{start_date_iso}}Z but OData requires full ISO 8601 timestamps (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ) or date-only without Z suffix. This causes the team roster query to return 0 results. See audit_results.md for detailed analysis.

title: Reduce console usage - implement structured logging
description: Found 20+ direct console.error/log/warn usage. Enforce consistent logging through logger utility with proper log levels and MCP protocol awareness for better debuggability.

title: Add input validation for area path backslash escaping
description: Area paths with backslashes may not be properly escaped in OData queries startswith function. WIQL UNDER operator works, but OData filtering may fail. Validate escaping and add tests for special characters.

title: Fix worker process cleanup warning in test suite
description: Jest: A worker process has failed to exit gracefully. Use --detectOpenHandles to find leaks. Likely QueryHandleService timers or HTTP client connections not properly cleaned up.

title: Add error boundary for Azure CLI token acquisition
description: Token acquisition should have better error boundaries and retry logic. Add: 1) Clear error messages for auth failures, 2) Retry logic with backoff, 3) Token refresh before expiration.

title: Subagent discovery not parsing YAML metadata correctly
description: wit-list-subagents scans files but doesn't extract metadata. Need to debug YAML parsing and content fetching logic.

title: Migrate chatmode files to agent format
description: VS Code: Chat modes renamed to agents. Move .github/chatmodes/*.chatmode.md to .github/agents/*.agent.md and update references.
notes: User requested chatmodes be restored. Chatmodes are useful and should not be migrated to agents format.

title: OData queries now use Azure CLI auth by default
description: Changed OData handler to automatically use Azure CLI authentication for Analytics API calls. OAuth tokens don't work with Analytics API, so this ensures OData queries work out of the box without requiring --authentication azcli flag.

title: API returns metadata object instead of file content
description: Git Items API with includeContent=true returns {objectId, gitObjectType, commitId, path} instead of actual file content. Need to use different endpoint or download method.

title: Optimize hierarchy validation output to return handles by default
description: Modified wit-validate-hierarchy tool to return only summary counts and query handles by default, avoiding token bloat from duplicate violation arrays. Added includeViolationDetails flag (default false) to optionally include full data. Updated tool descriptions and documentation. Reduces response size by ~3x for typical validation results.
